review_title: I have my own way to use this oil)
review_text: I have combination skin, all my life my cheeks nose and forehead are oily, with enlarged pores. After pregnancy, the skin type became completely incomprehensible, now very dry, then dehydrated, then oily. I really wanted smoothness, nourishment, moisturizing and removing (rather than oily sheen). In general, in life, oil on the skin of the face is not my story at all, they are not absorbed into me and after five minutes, the oily droplets treacherously shine at each pore. After meeting with the serum, JJ The Light decided to try to risk ordering this oil. Use as recommended by the manufacturer did not suit me. Therefore, I do this - pour a little Aloe in my palm (I have it from Instanatural - and it‚Äôs just great) and drop 2-3 drops of The Glow serum into it - mix and apply on the face. In this form, the effect is wonderful, the oil is perfectly absorbed, the skin looks really sleek, not oily. Now that the heating is turned on, this serum is my must have (but only paired with Aloe). You can still spray thermal water on your face and apply the glow on top of wet skin, but still the Aloe option is perfect for me!
